home_page.hero-sec1: A new transformation in laboratories and healthcare services based on strategic technology at Raymand Holding
home_page.hero-sec2: Raymand Group was established with the aim of creating an integrated, technology-based ecosystem in the supply chain, management, and service delivery. At Raymand Group, we strive, through a systematic, scientific, and value-driven approach, to transform the current standards of healthcare and laboratory services in the country. By leveraging advanced technologies and modern management strategies, our goal is to develop a localized model of the world’s best practices in laboratory service management, specialized equipment supply chain, and healthcare management in Iran.

discover.discover-intro: Raymand Group consists of three companies, each operating with the goal of transforming traditional systems in its field. With innovative methods and modern technologies, these companies aim to provide solutions to the challenges facing industrial, research, clinical laboratories, and healthcare in the country.
discover.raymand1-des1: Supply, import, and production of laboratory equipment and consumables based on GPO principles and value chain
discover.raymand1-des2: Procurement arm for importing specialized equipment from reputable global brands
discover.raymand1-des3: Using the GPO model, this company enables cost reduction and increased efficiency in the supply chain of industrial, research, and clinical laboratories in the country.
discover.raymand2-des1: Smart management and implementation of quality assurance systems for specialized, research, and clinical laboratories
discover.raymand2-des2: Implementation and auditing of international standards such as ISO 17025 and ISO 15189
discover.raymand2-des3: Designing laboratory process structures, preparing SOPs, and training human resources
discover.raymand2-des4: Consulting on purchasing, installation, calibration, and validation of equipment
discover.raymand2-des5: Resource management, including human resources, consumables, and capacity planning for laboratory services
discover.raymand2-des6: Improving efficiency, accuracy, and performance of laboratories
discover.raymand2-des7: Providing laboratory, research, and training services
discover.raymand3-des1: Smart management of healthcare services based on modern technologies
discover.raymand3-des3: Providing smart solutions for all healthcare units
discover.raymand3-des4: Designing operational models and organizational structures
discover.raymand3-des5: Virtual hospital and innovative transformations in healthcare services (including prevention, pre-hospital, hospital, and post-hospital)

home_page.newsBlog: Stay up to date with our latest news and insights
home_page.slogan3: Engineering the health solutions of the future

tech-Lab_page.subtitle: Raymand Group, a pioneer in testing for a better quality of life

generalInfo.visionDesc: Raymand Group aspires to become the most trusted specialized laboratory and healthcare network in Iran and the region; an institution that, through innovation, integration, and international standards, earns the trust of industries, universities, and society as a strategic partner in quality and healthcare.
generalInfo.missionDesc: At Raymand Group, by managing and developing a network of laboratories, providing specialized healthcare services, and supplying modern equipment, we help industries and society operate more accurately, healthily, and efficiently.

news.title1: We look forward to seeing you at the Laboratory Equipment Exhibition with the latest products from major international companies.
news.title2: Discover Raymand’s laboratory services in soil, water, microbiology, livestock and poultry, food, and pharmaceuticals.
news.title3: Soon, the latest developments and news in healthcare and medicine will be available through this section.

validation.phone_length: Phone number must be at least 11 digits
